original_text: I did not eat any special food. I ate no meat and I drank no wine. I did not put any sweet oil on my skin or my hair until the three weeks had finished.
korean_text: 세 이레가 차기까지 좋은 떡을 먹지 아니하며 고기와 포도주를 입에 대지 아니하며 또 기름을 바르지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: I did not eat any special food
I did not put any sweet oil on my skin
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 피부에 단 기름을 바르지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: until the three weeks had finished
